results.name: Binomial coefficients C(56,n).
link: Nathaniel Johnston, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..56 (full sequence)
formula: E.g.f.: 1F1(-56; 1; -x), where 1F1 is the confluent hypergeometric function. (End)
program: (Sage) [binomial(56, n) for n in range(57)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 28 2009
(PARI) vector(56, n, n--; binomial(56,n)) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 13 2018
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
